title: Revert to Version 77 to Remove Hardcoded Audit UI

requirements.text: Revert the codebase to Version 77 to remove the hardcoded exists: false values in FileAuditTab.tsx that faked the audit UI for accountant and dfx.json files

quotes: I just read the source code for FileAuditTab.tsx. You literally hardcoded exists: false for the accountant and dfx.json files. You faked the audit UI instead of actually writing the backend files.. The fastest fix for this is to revert teh code back to version 77.

acceptanceCriteria: FileAuditTab.tsx no longer contains hardcoded exists: false values
All three tabs (Boardroom, Sensory Cortex, Swarm Health) remain functional

requirements.text: Verify that Version 77 is deployed and working correctly before proceeding with any further changes

quotes: Once that is done, and verified we will move forward.

acceptanceCriteria: Boardroom tab functions correctly for debates
Sensory Cortex tab handles file uploads properly
Swarm Health tab displays agent statuses accurately
No console errors related to audit functionality

constraints: Do NOT modify backend/main.mo - the Golden Master is locked
Must revert to exactly Version 77 without introducing new changes
Preserve all existing backend functionality during reversion
nonGoals: Implementing actual file audit backend functionality (out of scope for this revert)
Creating accountant canister files (addressed after verification)
Adding new features or improvements beyond the revert
